alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 7:09PM CDT until August 25 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Smith County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Phillips County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Webster County in south central Nebraska... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Naponee to Agra to near Glade, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. In addition, at 651 PM CDT, a 64 MPH wind gust was measured by a Kansas Mesonet sensor at Phillipsburg. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smith Center, Kensington, Agra, Kirwin, Glade, Athol, Speed, and Cedar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
